parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: FASTA/Q input file. default is STDIN

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: FASTA/Q output file. default is STDOUT

parameters.name: DNA-to-RNA
parameters.description: DNA-to-RNA mode - change T's into U's

parameters.name: RNA-to-DNA
parameters.description: RNA-to-DNA mode - change U's into T's
